\nr<Vio>I see. So you were cursed with Transformation

but a pure blooded dragon. No wonder you're so strong.
\n<Gale>Awoo... And my Master was cursed with Mini... We
were 150,000 G away from getting the curses removed
from the rings so we can take them off.

\n<Gale>That's IF we return with Master... Whenever we were

\nr<Vio>There's no use worrying about him when we have more

pretty strong. You can't meet up with him if you're
dead, so let's get out of these woods.
